ValidationRule.description: Only let Parts PLMs edit the upper limit fields if the Spec has been submitted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(status__c) <> 'New') && AND( $Profile.Name != "GG Parts Product Line Manager",$Permission.GG_CBG_Allow_Pricing_Approval = False) && !CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Administrator") && (IsChanged(upperLimit1__c) || IsChanged(upperLimit2__c) || IsChanged(upperLimit3__c) || IsChanged(upperLimit4__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Upper Limit fields may not be edited at this time.
